content.text:
# TimedText:Sekai wa Sore demo Kawari wa Shinai sample.ogg.en.srt

1
00:00:13,020 --> 00:00:16,180
「必然的」なStory
"Hitsuzen-teki" na Story
Inevitable story
2
00:00:16,800 --> 00:00:24,040
世界はそれでも変わりはしない　謎のまま
Sekai wa sore demo kawari wa shinai　Nazo no mama
Even so the world doesn't change　Remaining a mystery
3
00:00:24,090 --> 00:00:30,220
小さな笑顔さえもBlueに染まってゆく
Chīsana egao sae mo Blue ni somatte yuku
Even the smallest smiles are dyed blue
